items.label: 使用d3dump文件重新开始作业

data.doc:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<descriptor id="ANS-DYNA" filled="true"><options name="base.parameter" info="基本参数" id="basic" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="作业名称" id="JOB_NAME" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="核数" id="NCPU" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="2" selected="false">2</option><option id="4" selected="true">4</option><option id="8" selected="false">8</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="队列" id="QUEUE" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="undefined" hidden="false"><option id="ansys" selected="true">ansys</option></option></options><options name="application.parameter" info="应用参数" id="app" narrow="true"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="版本" id="VERSION" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="undefined" hidden="false"><option id="145" selected="false">145</option><option id="172" selected="true">172</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="内存 (words)" id="MEMORY" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="800m" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="精度" id="PRECISION" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Single" selected="true">Single</option><option id="Double" selected="false">Double</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="内存构架" id="MEMARC" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="SMP" selected="true">SMP</option></option></options><options name="inputfile.parameter" info="输入文件" id="file" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="true" label="Deck输入文件" id="DECK" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label="其他文件" id="OTHERS_FILE" helpText="其他辅助输入文件" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label="使用d3dump文件重新开始作业" id="D3DUMP" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="true"></option></options></descriptor>
